error.title: Animation instance was not correctly collected
error.description: Animation instance {instance} was not collected correctly and is missing data.
error.detail: Collection of animation data failed. This is either because animation instance is incorrectly created or due to the bug. Checkout the output of animation collector.

error.title: Animation instance has invalid structure
error.description: Animation instance {instance} has invalid structure. It must have `out_SET` inside.
error.detail: Animation instance will know what to process based on Maya sets under it. To fix it, create `out_SET` under your animation instance set. If this instance is an unloaded reference, please deactivate it.

error.title: Animation instance was not correctly collected
error.description: Animation instance {instance} was not collected correctly and is missing data.
error.detail: Collection of animation data failed. This is either because animation instance is incorrectly created or due to the bug. Checkout the output of animation collector.
